featured.text: Surprised by the father and son’s “pale faces” and their battered vessel, the Penghu police and fishers in Paisha rescued them.
At night, when these fish become inactive, their colors may become pale.

definition.zh_def: 顏色或光線較淡的，通常指缺乏飽和度或強度。
definition.en_def: Having a light or low saturation of color; lacking brightness or intensity.
definition.example: The walls were painted a pale blue.
